descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Fairy Glade !
 
  Here in the Fairy Glade you can get training for your player. There are 9 different Fairies to help you. Each teaches a different skill. They are all master trainers, if you have the gold. Just do not make them angry.

  Meet the Fairies :
  
   Sunny the orange fairy teaches Alteration
   Violet the purple fairy teaches Conjuration
   Bianca the black fairy teaches Destruction
   Treeha the green fairy teaches Illision
   Yelondra the yellow fairy teaches Restoration
   Crimsun the red fairy teaches Enchanting
   Teela the teal fairy teaches Alchemy
   Peltra the brown fairy teaches Archery
   Sky the blue fairy sells potions and ingredients 
 
 So come to the Fairy Glade and learn something !






Please do not upload anyplace and ask permission for use, Thanks BG
author: badgremlin
